location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '24'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Linga [Lingeh] of two yakhchāls. Here described as ‘birkehs’, which are cisterns, most likely ice pits. In the background, palm trees line the horizon. In the middle-ground two women walk across the scene.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘25’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘"Birkehs."’ ‘(Jan. 1918)’
